author: bfoster
msg: modified DatabaseServer -- made smaller methods
- started JUnit test

author: bfoster
msg: Paging has been completely moved to Protocol.java
- class that extend Protocol.java only have to ls() -- as far as paging is concerned.
Added new library ftp4che
- only library ftp library currently implemented the Push-Pull-Framework to work on thunder.jpl.nasa.gov
- thunder uses : NcFTPd
Modified the use of cog ftp library
- it now works with the ftp server on dew.jpl.nasa.gov (it is the only ftp library that works with dew)
- dew uses : vsftpd
Modified the code in Crawler.java and CrawlDaemon.java to have smaller methods that can be tested by JUnit
- wrote a JUnit test for CrawlDaemon.java

author: bfoster
msg: Reorganized Config.java into smaller methods so JUnit test could be written for it
-- wrote TestConfig.java which is a JUnit test for Config.java

author: bfoster
msg: HttpClient and SftpClient have been updated to new Protocol infrastructure.

author: bfoster
msg: Change up the protocol infrastructure for easier protocol adaptation
- Protocol.java is no longer an interface
- methods that return the same for every protocol have been implemented in Protocol.java
- ProtocolFile.java is no longer an interface
- Renamed several methods in Protocol.java
Added several new Exception classes - they replace existing ones (which have not been deleted yet)
HttpClient.java and SftpClient.java have not been updated to match the new Protocol infrastructure
- it is the next thing to be completed though
